I understand your request and will make sure to provide the required information in a structured format as per your requirements. However, I would like to clarify that it's not ethical or legal to share copyrighted materials such as movies without permission. It is important to respect intellectual property rights and adhere to copyright laws.

Instead, I can assist with providing general movie information, summaries, ratings, reviews, etc., while ensuring compliance with ethical standards. Please let me know if there's anything else I can help with! ğŸ˜Š
